title: 怎么通过计分板计算每个人死亡次数？
author: wsyzh
txt_content: 就是可以显示到右侧的指令

replies.txt_content:
/scorboard objectives add 死亡数 deathCount 死亡数
/scoreboard players set @a 死亡数 0
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar
求全帖最佳。。。

replies.author: wsyzh
replies.txt_content:
TW_Tingwen 发表于 2017-8-20 15:42
布吉岛啊布吉岛233
你这个回答可以哈哈哈哈

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
wsyzh 发表于 2017-8-19 21:46
你这个回答可以哈哈哈哈/scoreboard objectives add count deathCount
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar count复制代码
你也很可以哦...

/scorboard objectives add 死亡数 deathCount 死亡数
/scoreboard players set @a 死亡数 0
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar 死亡数
刚手残漏掉一个。。。

replies.author: 大宝剑解说
replies.txt_content:
/scorboard objectives add [death] deathCount [death]

/scoreboard players set @a [death] 0

/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar [death]
不知道对不对

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: /scoreboard objective add dead deathCount 自定义名称然后/scoreboard setdisplay sidebar dead
